description: Add prominent CTAs across the landing page directing users to the demo request page. Implement: 1) Hero section CTA button 'Request Early Access' or 'Book a Demo', 2) Sticky header CTA on scroll, 3) Feature section CTAs after each major feature description, 4) 'Get Started' button in navigation linking to demo request, 5) Exit-intent modal offering demo request when user tries to leave site, 6) Pricing page CTA if pricing page exists. Ensure consistent button styling using shadcn/ui Button components. Track CTA click-through rates with analytics.
title: Landing Page Call-to-Action Integration
